author: Mark Kaufman
title: Stop comparing coronavirus to other deadly viruses
description:
The new coronavirus has some stark differences from other relatively recent, grim outbreaks of disease. 
Take, for example, the SARS outbreak in 2003 (also a coronavirus), the H1N1 flu in 2009, or even the ongoing HIV epidemic. They don't compare for a number…
